remarks: Lemma for ~ vdw .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Sep-2014.)
statement:
vdwlem3.v $e |- ( ph -> V e. NN ) $.
vdwlem3.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. NN ) $.
vdwlem3.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( 1 ... V ) ) $.
vdwlem3.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( 1 ... W ) ) $.
vdwlem3 $p |- ( ph -> ( B + ( W x. ( ( A - 1 ) + V ) ) ) e. ( 1 ... ( W x. ( 2 x. V ) ) ) ) $.
